The proper way to look at it is:
Imagine you are on a raft in a river careening toward a waterfall.
God has his hand out to grab you to safety.
YOU must reach back and grab hold.
Is it God's fault you are too stupid or proud to grab his hand?

its GODS fault the river even exists..
and its GOD who created the fucking WATERFALL..
So FUCK God and his sadistic "hunger games" style BULLSHIT!
He is an evil dictator and a total and utter CUNT!
WE did not ask to be born into this world..
HE FORCED us..
WE did not ask to have to play this stupid fucking game of "LOVE me or I TORTURE YOU FOREVER"....
so take your waterfall making river creating hate inducing torturing CUNT of a tyrant..
AND his so called outstretched hand..and SHOVE it up his ALMIGHTY DICTATORAL SADISTIC FUCKING ASS!

I feel bad for people like you and it speaks of massive mental illness to not believe consciousness doesn't persist after death.
Anyone with a little logic can look at the world and understand from quantum to atomic to macro scale physics that this universe was designed by something. That something has given us the ability to experience many things it would be a gross oversight in logical thinking to believe it all just becomes nothing in moment of death and that this designed world is pointless if consciousness doesn't exist after death.
Anyone with a iota of logic can deduce there must be something after death. Maybe not hell and heaven, maybe hell and heaven maybe something else entirely but a designed universe that give us these experiences is more then likely going to have a life of some type after death.
